document_data.name: Horroodissomoth Xorlarrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Horroodissomoth Xorlarrin''' was the house wizard and patron (with [[Matron Mother]] [[Zeerith Q'Xorlarrin]]) of [[House  Xorlarrin|House Xorlarrin]] around [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Description: He appeared very old, but that was rumored to be due to a magical experiment gone wrong.
document_data.History:
Horroodissomoth was the leader of a council of mages that governed the magical academy of [[Sorcere]] in [[1370 DR]]. He was second only to the [[Archmage of Menzoberranzan]], [[Gromph Baenre]].

Horroodissomoth was later driven insane by the [[Spellplague]]. He was killed by his own 
''[[delayed blast fireball]]'', which he had placed in his vest pocket.
